Author: Pingvalue
Title: [ANN] Pingvalue - Future of local shopping
Body: Pingvalue is the future of local shopping. Enabling SmartCities and SmartHoods. Get ready for our PreICO http://pingvalue.io      What is Pingvalue?  Pingvalue is a people-centric open platform that innovates the current socio-economic model by enabling relevant and trustworthy interactions/transactions between people and businesses/institutions:  For people: A Smart Personal Agenda and Digital Wallet. Relevant recommendations when and where they are needed, together with trustworthy transactions. For businesses: A One-Stop Shop Management Solution. Know your customers better through digital interactions (Spot your Audience), and attract them to the physical stores/places with relevant communication (Spot your Target). For institutions: A Smart Urban Panel. Brand your city, engage with citizens and visitors & co-create smart neighborhoods (smarthoods).  Read more: http://pingvalue.io

Author: TimeTeller
Title: [ANN] Pingvalue - Future of local shopping
Body: Where will you test first this platform - as a local shopping services? And where do you plan to have that smart neighborhood? You can't say that you will do that worldwide. That's not feasible at the beginning. Otherwise, you're just talking gibberish here.

Author: joseorallo
Title: [ANN] Pingvalue - Future of local shopping
Body: Thank you for your message John!  The team is checking the site, and we will contact you if needed.  Talk soon! - Jose

Author: joseorallo
Title: [ANN] Pingvalue - Future of local shopping
Body: Hello TimeTeller,  We are glad to respond your questions hereunder.  The platform has been tested in a touristic and business park located at C-Mine, Genk, Belgium, since February 2016. The team was awarded by Cisco in October 2016. Restaurants and bars have been the first clients to interact with their own customers to better manage their marketing and sales activities, to know and connect directly with their real customers.  Related to the smart neighbourhoods, the teams is starting in those places where there are Pingvalue offices: Benelux, Italy and Spain. The program and business plan has been validated by the EU Commission through the Seal of Excellence H2020 last July, 2017. Also, by the Ministry of Economy and Industry in Spain through the ICEX/InvestInSpain program last October 2017.  Indeed, the team is realistic, and those validated business plans are prepared to expand operation in the European Union, with quarterly milestones. There are USA and Canadian organisations willing to collaborate, too. More news in due time.  More details about the project timeline, trusted by, and awarded by, available at www.pingvalue.io  The team would be glad to organise a call with you.  Talk soon! - Jose

Author: Virgo xXx
Title: [ANN] Pingvalue - Future of local shopping
Body: this project founded at january 2014,, and have about €1.2M funds by Invest In Future anyway are the funds will be used for developing this project ?

Author: joseorallo
Title: [ANN] Pingvalue - Future of local shopping
Body: Good afternoon Igor! Yes, the team has planned to launch a bounty program which will posted here, too

Author: joseorallo
Title: [ANN] Pingvalue - Future of local shopping
Body: Very good question, Marilouadrie. The project is focused on solving of the ad fraud as a starting point, where the ID of real users, and automation of proof of stake and revenue sharing remain central to this area of the smart city/marketing vertical for citizens, businesses, and public entities.  Needless to say, the same solution can be applied, then, to trade marketing and promotions, e-commerce, use of public services offered by cities. Step by step.

Author: joseorallo
Title: [ANN] Pingvalue - Future of local shopping
Body: The project started during a business trip from Luxembourg to Silicon Valley, where Cisco, and tech firms´managers shared their problems to bridge the digital and physical worlds of both companies and real citizens.  By 2015, the founder had run beta versions for the proof of concept, and by the middle of 2016, InvestInFuture joined this journey. The founder is also adding financial resources, and talent, when needed, and the objective of the ICO is to accelerate the development of the platform, and the business expansion with all the organisations who share the same vision.  The details of the split are available at www.pingvalue.io Please, feel free to contact the team for further details!
